CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Aetna"), Soft_Opt_Out__c= TRUE), "Use Iframe as usual",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Aetna"), ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c,"HDHP With HSA")), "Use Iframe Deductible Only",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Aetna"),Soft_Opt_Out__c=FALSE), "Fully Covered",
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Comcast"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"BCBSLA"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"BCBST"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Premera BCBS of Alaska"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Premera BC of Washington"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Humana")), "Fully Covered",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Horizon"), ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c,"HDHP With HSA")) ,"Use Iframe Deductible Only - IC Fully Covered",
IF(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Premera"), "Use Iframe as Usual - IC Fully Covered",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Horizon"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c, "HDHP With HSA"))) ,"Fully Covered",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Optum - United HealthCare"), Group_PlanSponsor__c = "AMERICAN EXPRESS COMPANY"), "Use Iframe as Usual - IC Fully Covered",
IF( AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Harvard Pilgrim Health Care"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"UnitedHealthcare"), ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"United Healthcare - Oxford")), ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c,"HDHP With HSA")) ,"Use Iframe Deductible Only - IC Fully Covered",
IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"United Healthcare - Oxford"), Group_PlanSponsor__c = "STATE OF CONNECTICUT"), "Fully Covered",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Optum - United Healthcare"), ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c, "HDHP With HSA"), NOT(Group_PlanSponsor__c = "AMERICAN EXPRESS COMPANY")), "Use Iframe Deductible Only - IC Fully Covered",
IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c,"Horizon")),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(High_Deductible_Health_Plan__c, "HDHP With HSA" )),
NOT( Group_PlanSponsor__c = "AMERICAN EXPRESS COMPANY")),
"Fully Covered",
"use iframe as usual"))))))))))))
CustomField.label: HDHP Indicator
